products.title: Djeco Topanifarm Stacking Cubes for Infants - Adorable Farm Animal Homes for Little Ones, Develops Skills, Ages 18 Months+
products.description: Djeco Topanifarm Stacking Cubes for infants Discover a world of farmyard fun with Djeco Topanifarm Stacking Cubes for infants, the ultimate introduction to stacking and imaginative play. These gorgeously tactile and beautifully designed cardboard cubes offer delightful homes for six charming rubber farm animals. Watch as your little one joyfully builds towers and then sends them tumbling down, all without a worry thanks to their safe, lightweight card construction. This engaging toy is not just about fun; it's a wonderful tool for developing essential early skills. It actively encourages the growth of stacking prowess, sharpens hand-eye coordination, enhances manual dexterity, and provides a fantastic springboard for developing language skills as your child names the animals and their homes. Each cube in this set of six is vibrantly illustrated with charming farm scenes, inviting children into a world of stories and creativity. Inside each cube, a space awaits a friendly animal companion, fostering a sense of discovery and nurturing play. The set comes complete with six delightful, tactile rubber animals that are perfectly sized for little hands to grasp and place. These chunky, easy-to-hold animals are a joy to interact with, adding another layer of sensory exploration. The vibrant colors and friendly animal designs are sure to capture your infant's attention and spark their curiosity, making learning an exciting adventure. Djeco's Topanifarm Stacking Cubes are designed with durability and safety in mind, ensuring countless hours of engaging playtime. They are more than just stacking toys; they are a gateway to creative storytelling and a stepping stone for cognitive development. This set, recommended for ages 18 months and up, is a truly special addition to any baby's toy collection, offering educational value wrapped in delightful fun. It’s a toy that grows with your child, offering new ways to play as they develop. The sturdy card construction means these cubes can withstand enthusiastic play, while the smooth edges ensure safety for little ones. Each animal is uniquely designed to fit snugly within its corresponding cube, promoting problem-solving skills as children learn to match the shapes. The tactile nature of the rubber animals provides a wonderful sensory experience, stimulating touch and grip. This is one of those truly special toys that becomes a cherished part of childhood.

products.title: Early Robots Robot Pet Shop
products.description: Owls, French Bulldogs, Sloths, and More! Build a series of adorable, motorised robotic animals with this introductory mechanical engineering kit for kids ages five and up. A beautifully illustrated 32-page storybook centres around the adventures of the Omegas — the family of makers and engineers featured in other Kids First early engineering kits. This story takes the characters to a robotic pet shop where they encounter all sorts of cute robotic pets, including an owl, french bulldog, sloth, panda, chameleon, cat, turtle, and rabbit. As they follow the story, kids can build models of these eight robots and experiment with them to see how each one uses the battery-powered motor and mechanical parts to move in a different way. Large, cubic plastic building pieces make it easy for small hands to put the models together. Robot Pet Shop provides an engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age. Model building and experiments develop fine motor skills, mechanical engineering skills, visual-spatial skills, and reasoning and concept development skills. Includes gorgeous storybook manual. Requires 2 AA batteries. Ages 5 to 7+

products.title: Motors & Generators
products.description:
This kit appeals to lots of children as it is both enjoyable and active, creating noise, light and motion. Includes a hand-operated generator and an electric motor. This kit also has a fabulous 48 page colour booklet.

 Electric motors and generators are in countless devices, appliances, and vehicles we use every day. They are an essential technology in our modern world. With this kit, you can conduct 25 experiments to learn how an electric motor converts electricity into motion, and how an electric generator does just the opposite, converting motion into electricity.

The electric motor is made of transparent plastic to show how the inside components work. Set up the motor to run on battery power and learn how a motor works. Then reconfigure the device to work in reverse as a hand-crank electric generator. 

 Experiment with magnets to learn about the force of magnetism, and how magnetic fields relate to electric current. Build simple circuits consisting of the motor or generator, wires, and a light bulb to learn about the flow of electricity. Learn about gears and drive-trains and how they work to effectively convert kinetic energy into electrical energy and back again. 

 The full-colour, 48-page manual guides your experiments with step-by-step instructions. 

 Age 8+

products.title: Electric Plane Launcher
products.description:
Ready for take off!  Discover how spinning motors and pulley wheels can launch a paper plane at up to 40 km/h. 

 Build your paper plane launcher, try out some different paper plane designs and then launch them! Work out which designs fly furthest, fastest or do the best acrobatics!

 The plane launcher uses two rotating wheels . A lot of energy is stored in the wheels when they are spinning. When you slip your paper plane in between, some of the energy is transferred to it and the plane is launched out at high speed.

 You can adjust the height of the legs on the plane launcher to launch the planes at different angles.

 An educational kit that demonstrates a scientific principle in a fun way. Assembly and operation of the toy should be supervised by an adult - they won’t be able to help themselves - who doesn’t love playing with paper planes, no matter what the age!

 Produced by award-winning toy manufacturer 4M, leaders in STEAM toys for kids.

products.title: Orbiting Solar System Creation Kit
products.description: Set the planets in motion with a flick of your wrist! Build a mechanical model of the solar system including the sun and eight planets (also known as an orrery), wind it up, and watch the planets revolve around the sun. Assemble this complex machine using snap-together plastic parts to learn how the gears and wind-up mechanism work to spin the model. Detail each planet with colourful, realistic-looking printed planet graphics. Discover how a special type of gear called a planetary gear is used to simulate the mesmerizing motion of the solar system. Learn about the order of the planets, their relative sizes, their rates of revolution around the sun, their appearance, and other planetary facts. Bonus: There’s a built-in expansion slot in case the mysterious Planet Nine is discovered! This kit includes full-colour step-by-step illustrated assembly instructions. + Build a colourful model of the solar system. + Wind-up engine sets your planets in motion around the sun – no batteries required + Learn about the planets’ celestial orbits. + Explore fundamental gear mechanics; planets travel at different speeds depending on the gear ratio. Age 8+

products.title: Electricity & Magnetism 60 Experiments
products.description:
Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit.

 Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs.

 Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet.

 Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key.

 The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices.

 The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams.

 Age 8+

The aim of the game is to get as many points as possible by travelling round the game board answering multiple choice questions on everything from capitals, countries and continents to tallest mountains and saltiest seas. Players can also refresh their grasp of the subject by downloading a Go Genius Learning Aid online. Imagine the joy of selecting from eight vibrant tubes of colorful glass beads, each a tiny jewel waiting to be strung. Kids will have a blast experimenting with color combinations, mixing and matching hues to invent their very own unique patterns that truly express their individual style. This isn't just about making pretty accessories; it’s a wonderfully enriching activity that fosters crucial developmental skills. As little hands meticulously thread each bead, they’ll be enhancing their concentration and fine motor skills. The process of envisioning and executing a design encourages imaginative thinking and problem-solving, allowing their creativity to flourish. Furthermore, understanding color theory and pattern development subtly introduces them to basic design principles. The kit thoughtfully includes everything needed to get started right away: one sturdy loom, a generous assortment of eight tubes filled with glistening glass beads in a rainbow of shades, and two bundles of high-quality thread to bring all their beaded masterpieces to life. These handmade bracelets are not only perfect for personal adornment, adding a touch of handmade charm to any outfit, but also make incredibly thoughtful and special gifts for friends, family, or classmates, showing off the crafter's talent and heartfelt effort. You can design and rearrange your track layout again and again, creating endless possibilities for your miniature railway. This kit encourages problem-solving, fine motor skills, and imaginative storytelling, making it a valuable addition to playtime. products.title: Artisan Nest Box
products.description:
Introducing the Artisan Nest Box from the beautiful Bali Range, handmade and hand-painted by Balinese artisans in a genuinely authentic Indonesian style. The entire range is constructed using sustainably sourced timber and has been lovingly hand-painted using a dot painting technique.

 Each Nest box features a beautifully detailed hand-painted dot painting design. The Artisan Nest Boxes are made from sustainable timber and have a long lifespan due to the robust wood and water-based paint. Ensuring the nest box can be used for multiple seasons, sometimes as a nesting spot for the same returning garden birds. Provides a safe and secure habitat for small birds to roost and nest from autumn through the winter to spring when they will look to have their young.

 Nesting is most likely during April and May, and in the event of chicks hatching, there will be frenetic feeding activity by the parent birds. Take care not to disturb during this time as any intervention may result in the parent birds' eggs or young being abandoned.

 It is the perfect nest box for small bird species such as blue tits, coal tits, marsh tits, sparrows, and flycatchers, plus a delightful addition to your garden.

products.title: Crystal Growing Experimental Kit
products.description:
Start a fantastic crystal collection by growing your very own crystals and then exhibiting them in display cases. Make small, medium and large-size crystals, or make different coloured crystals by mixing the red, blue and white seeding mixtures in different proportions. This science kit contains everything you need for successful crystal growing!

 First, pour one of the large bags of white crystal compound into some hot water (ideally boiling water) and stir to dissolve, using the stirring bowl. Later, pour this solution into one of the hexagonal transparent covers and leave to settle. Then gently sprinkle one of the small bags of seeding mixture onto the solution using the spoon. Leave in a warm room (on top of the fridge is good) and do not disturb – after a few days you’ll have some great-looking crystals. And remember, the longer you leave them, the bigger they’ll grow!

 Both fun and educational, with the Crystal Growing Experimental Kit you’ll find out about saturated solutions, discover how particles behave in water and learn how crystals are formed.

 Crystals grow in seven basic shapes, called crystal systems. In each system the atoms or molecules that make up the crystal are stacked together in a different pattern. The crystal systems are called cubic, tetragonal, hexagonal, monoclinic, triclinic, orthorhombic and rhombohedral.

 Contents:

  
 * 3 x large bags of white crystal compound* (a base compound called Monoammonium Phosphate) 
 * 3 x small bags containing seeding mixture* 
 * 1 x large display base with hexagonal transparent cover 
 * 2 x medium display bases with hexagonal transparent covers 
 * 4 x small display bases with hexagonal transparent covers 
 * 1 x stirring bowl, 1 x stirring spoon 
 * 1 x large ring-shaped template 
 * 2 x medium ring-shaped templates 
 * 4 x small ring-shaped templates 
 * Detailed Instructions and Safety Advice to reassure.  Age 10+

products.title: Hydropower Renewable Energy Science Kit
products.description: Hydropower has been used for hundreds of years in watermills and is now commonly used to generate electricity in applications such as hydroelectric dams and tidal power plants. Explore the power of water by building models and conducting experiments with them. Learn about how different devices are used to extract useful energy from moving water — from a waterwheel in a small stream to a giant turbine in a tidal power station. Build a waterwheel, a sawmill, and a hammer mill to harness the energy of moving water to do different types of physical work. Investigate the intriguing properties of water by performing experiments involving surface tension, adhesion, and cohesion. Learn about water pressure by building a water tower, communicating vessels, and a water fountain. Construct a hydroelectric power station to generate electricity and light an LED. Learn about where the energy in ocean waves, tides, and rivers comes from, and discover how we can generate electricity from them. The full-colour, 32-page experiment manual offers illustrated instructions and scientific information. Ages 8+

products.title: Architectural Engineering
products.description:
Soaring spires, towering arches, fascinatingly complex curves and angles! Build your foundation in architectural design with this fascinating STEM experiment kit that explores the engineering principles behind planning and developing buildings and structures. Through model building exercises you play the role of architect and engineer as you piece together an array of models, from small, basic structural elements like trusses, arches, and domes, to giant complex models of real-world buildings. Try recreating some of the world’s most interesting buildings! With 20 guided model builds, you can construct stadiums, skyscrapers, a ferris wheel, and more.

 By getting hands-on with these exercises, you’ll develop an understanding of how architectural engineers apply scientific principles to their designs and how the buildings and structures of the 21st century push materials and engineering to the limits. The 44-page, full-colour manual guides your journey while encouraging independent exploration. What is the tallest tower, the most voluminous dome, or the longest bridge you can build with the modular building pieces? How will you use what you learn to further your architectural journey?

 Age 8+

products.title: Simple Machines Mechanical Engineering
products.description:
Learn the fun foundational physics of simple machines!

 Jumpstart your study of mechanical physics by learning all about simple machines and how they’re used to make complex tasks easier to do. Through 26 model-building exercises, you’ll investigate all 6 classic simple machines — wheels and axles, levers, pulleys, inclined planes, screws, and wedges — as well as gears.

 Start off with simple models to guarantee a firm understanding of the basic principles at play, and then move onto larger, more complex models to push the machines harder and see how they can work together.

 Also included is a specially designed spring scale so that you can measure how the machines change the direction and magnitude of forces, making work easier to do. With this durable, modular construction system, you can see how the same basic elements combine in different ways to form each machine. The models can be assembled and disassembled again and again; combine the pieces to create your own configurations, limited only by your imagination!

 In addition to the invaluable hands-on experience you’ll get from model building, the 32-page, full-colour manual also dives into examples of simple machines in action in everyday life. The seesaw at the playground, the wheelbarrow in your backyard, the flagpole in front of your school — all of these are examples of simple machines in the real world! So start building, investigating, and experimenting to discover how physics is all around us!

 Age 8+

products.title: Sight Word Swat Game: Fun Educational Board Game for Kids Aged 4+ Building Reading Confidence with 300 High-Frequency Words!
products.description: Sight Word Swat Game An Engaging Educational Game for Young Readers to Master Sight Words with Fun and Speed Get ready for a reading adventure with the Sight Word Swat Game, a super fun and energetic way for children to become word-whiz kids! This game is designed to make learning essential sight words an absolute blast, building confidence with every swat. Sight words are those super important words that fluent readers recognize instantly, like magic! Some are easy to sound out, but others, the tricky ones, need a little memorization, and that's exactly where this game shines. Players grab their very own child-sized fly swatters, colorful and perfectly sized for little hands. As words are called out, it's a race to see who can spot and swat the fly card showing the correct sight word first! The player with the most swatted flies at the end of the round is declared the sight word champion! This game is fantastic for budding readers aged 4 and up, and it’s perfect for family game nights, supporting 1 to 4 players. It’s thoughtfully color-coded to align with the Letters & Sounds phonics program, making it a breeze to weave into learning, whether you're a parent or a teacher using various phonics approaches in UK primary schools. Inside this exciting box, you'll discover 300 high-frequency words, conveniently categorized from phases 2–6 of the Letters & Sounds framework, and the color-coding on the cards makes sorting and choosing them for play super simple. For those just starting their reading journey, you can begin with a smaller selection of cards from a particular phase, and as they grow more confident, you can introduce more cards or even mix in cards from different phases to add an extra layer of fun and challenge. We've even highlighted those "tricky" words with a special marker to gently remind little learners that these are the ones that can't be sounded out phonetically, encouraging them to memorize them. The game set includes 4 vibrant and durable fly swatters, each measuring a perfect 23cm, along with 150 double-sided fly cards packed with words, and easy-to-follow instructions to get the fun started right away. The plastic swatters are built to last through countless rounds of energetic play. This game is not just about memorization; it's about developing quick recognition skills and fostering a positive association with reading. The fast-paced nature of the game keeps little ones engaged and excited, transforming potentially challenging words into a thrilling challenge. It’s an ideal way to supplement classroom learning or to enjoy an enriching playtime at home. Prepare for giggles, excitement, and a significant leap in reading fluency as your child becomes a master of sight words with the Sight Word Swat Game!

products.title: Proverbs 1 Gamecards: Enhance Grammar Skills with Fun English Learning for Ages 3+ | Wise Sayings & Pithy Phrases for Kids & Adults
products.description: Proverbs: Spark a Love for Language with Our Engaging Grammar Card Game Get ready for a delightful journey into the fascinating world of English with Proverbs, the ultimate grammar card game designed to make learning fun for the whole family! Forget dull drills; this game transforms the often tricky aspects of English grammar into an exciting challenge that will captivate both young minds and seasoned adults. Inside, you'll discover a vibrant deck of 52 beautifully illustrated cards, each featuring a wise and pithy proverb. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to lovingly pair these proverbs with their correct interpretations or related phrases. It's like a treasure hunt for wisdom! To guide your quest and ensure every correct match is celebrated, we've included a clear and comprehensive list of the correct pairs, making it easy for everyone to follow along and learn. This isn't just about memorizing facts; it's about building a deeper understanding and appreciation for the nuances of the English language, fostering sharper thinking and enhanced communication skills. Imagine the family game nights filled with laughter, friendly competition, and the rewarding "aha!" moments as you conquer each proverb. Proverbs is perfect for little learners aged 3 and up, offering a gentle introduction to sophisticated language, and it's equally engaging for older children and adults who want to refine their grasp of English idioms and expressions. This game is a fantastic educational tool that encourages critical thinking, pattern recognition, and vocabulary expansion. As you play, you'll discover how much fun it can be to unravel the meaning behind these timeless sayings and their clever applications. Make language learning an adventure and create cherished memories with Proverbs. And the fun doesn't stop here! Explore our other exciting language games in the series, including Antonyms, Homonyms, and Collective Nouns, to build an even more comprehensive language toolkit for your family. Proverbs is more than just a game; it's an investment in your child's intellectual growth and a joyful way to connect as a family.

products.title: Cambridge Brainbox 900 Explorer 2 Electronics Kit

your computer into a oscilloscope. Using this you can explore the
wave forms produced buy the circuits and see the results of any
changes you make to the circuit.

 The Cambridge Brainbox 900 Explorer 2 Electronics Kit is designed to build upon the skills already learnt in primary school and to increase the student's knowledge of the principles of electronics. The kit could be used to enhance the understanding of Key Stage 3 and 4 electronics it is that comprehensive.

 The kit has over 60 individual components including transistors,
resistors and capacitors. Circuits in the instruction manual range from the basic, lighting a single bulb, and progresses through using pre-programmed sound modules to building an FM radio.

 Students can experiment by designing their own circuits such as
how to control events like switching on a bedroom light when the
daylight fades or using a magnetic sensor to see if a window has
been left open.

 Clear circuit diagrams are included to help your child:

• Build your own FM and AM radio

• Learn about and design Electric circuits

products.description: STEM Science Advent Calendar 2025 Vol 3 Unwrap a Winter Wonderland of Scientific Discovery This Holiday Season Get ready for an unforgettable Christmas adventure with the STEM Science Advent Calendar 2025 Vol 3! Imagine the excitement on your child's face as they discover a brand new science experiment every single day leading up to the big jolly man’s arrival. This isn't just any advent calendar; it's a gateway to a world of curiosity and hands-on fun, perfect for aspiring scientists aged 8 and up. Each of the 24 beautifully designed boxes is a treasure chest waiting to be opened, revealing not just new equipment or fascinating materials, but also clear, expertly written, and vibrantly illustrated instructions to guide your young explorer. These aren't complicated, time-consuming projects; each experiment is designed to be quick and engaging, using everyday items you likely already have in your home, making the magic of science accessible and stress-free for busy families. You’ll be amazed as your children delve into a wide array of captivating scientific topics, from the colorful reactions of chemistry to the intricate workings of biology and the fundamental principles of physics. This calendar ingeniously blends the cherished tradition of an advent countdown with the power of practical, tried-and-tested learning, creating moments of shared discovery and sparking a lifelong love for STEM. The Thames and Kosmos brand ensures quality and educational value in every meticulously crafted box. What sets this advent calendar apart is its commitment to providing not just materials, but genuine understanding. Inside each box, you’ll find an instruction manual that cleverly unfolds to reveal not only step-by-step directions but also insightful scientific explanations. This ensures that your child isn’t just performing an experiment, but truly learning the 'why' behind the magic, fostering a deeper comprehension of scientific concepts. Prepare for giggles, gasps of wonder, and the joyful buzz of discovery as your family embarks on this exciting scientific journey together, making this Christmas season the most educational and memorable one yet.

products.title: Structural Engineer, Bridges & Skyscapers
products.description:
Do you ever wonder how bridges span huge distances and how skyscrapers stay standing? Structural engineers use physics and their knowledge of the properties of building materials and geometric shapes to design structures with sufficient strength and stability.

 With this kit of modular building pieces, you can learn the basics of structural engineering by conducting a series of 20 model-building experiments. Each model demonstrates a basic principle of mechanical physics or structural engineering in a hands-on way.

 Start out with small models that demonstrate how structural elements can be attached together to maximize the strength of a structure for a fixed amount of material used. Learn about basic structural elements including columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary. Explore the forces acting on structural components including tension, compression, shear, and bending.

 Move onto building more complex models of trusses, roofs, and small buildings. Experiment with different types of bridge construction: a truss bridge, arch bridge, cantilever bridge, rope bridge, and suspension bridge. Finally, build models of towering skyscrapers. What is the tallest tower you can build using only the pieces included in the kit?

 Learn about the strength and stiffness of materials. See how structural engineers optimize factors to maximize safety, and minimize cost and the risk of structural failure.

 A 36-page, full-color manual guides you through model building with step-by-step illustrated instructions.

  
 Age 8-14.

products.title: The Genius Star
products.description:
The Genius Star!

 Play solo, or race an opponent to fill the star!

 The aim of each of the 165,888 possible puzzles is to complete the star using the eleven coloured shapes, once the seven ‘blockers’ have been positioned. There may be times when it seems impossible, but there will ALWAYS be at least one solution... and that’s why it’s called The Genius Star!

 Roll the seven dice and place a ‘blocker’ piece into the triangle matching the seven numbers that appear on the faces. Now race your opponent to fill every other space on the grid using the 11 shapes.

 There is also a wonderful new twist to each challenge, in the shape of a ‘Golden Star’. Will you play safe and complete a regular win, or will you go for a double win, by completing the challenge with the ‘Golden Star’ in one piece? Only 57.4% of the puzzles actually have a solution with the ‘Golden Star’ whole, so it’s a tough decision to make. You’ll need speed of thought... and nerves of steel! There’s also a web page where you can input your coordinates and find out whether the ‘Golden Star’ can be completed in one piece!

 Age 8+

products.title: Gecko Marble Run Starter Pack
products.description: Gecko Run takes classic marble runs to the next level with new creative challenges and less restrictive building requirements. This innovative marble run uses a specially designed system of flexible tracks that does not require any support structures. Traditional marble runs require lots of pieces to create vertical height, but with Gecko Run, your doors, windows, cupboards, bookcases – virtually any smooth surface – become part of your track, allowing you to build higher with fewer pieces. Attach the tracks to surfaces with the help of clever nano pads, which work like nanoscopic suction cups, to create a strong, but temporary bond. Because the pads are not glue-based, they can be quickly and easily repositioned many times without damaging adhesives or sticky residue. A quick wipe with a microfiber cloth will keep your pads ready for action! The versatile tracks are made from renewable, durable, and sustainably sourced raw materials. Thanks to their wide range of motion and flexibility, you can create hills and jumps, and even turn corners to generate a limitless number of tricks and stunts. No two tracks are ever the same! Each unique configuration promotes hands-on experimentation, supports problem-solving through trial-and-error, develops motor skills, and encourages creativity for kids and their grown-ups! The Gecko Run Starter Set includes everything you need to zip, zag, bounce, skip, and hurdle into an awesome engineering adventure. A 16-page illustrated manual guides you through setting up your first runs and teaches you how all the different elements work. Witness physics in action! Use independently or combine with any of the expansion packs. Intuitive: Tracks attach to smooth surfaces with the help of clever nano-adhesive pads that stick to smooth, vertical surfaces around your home Mess-free: The pads are not glue-based and can be quickly and easily repositioned without leaving behind damage or sticky residue. Open-Ended: Position in endless configurations on smooth surfaces Educational: Develop engineering and problem-solving skills, and see physics in action Tracks made from renewable raw materials Additional stunts available in expansion packs (sold separately) Conduct an action-packed series of hands-on physics and engineering lessons with an easy, modular building system. Piece together the sturdy frame structures and then attach the flexible track to it to build and test endless roller coaster designs. Experiment by varying the weight of the cars and varying the slope, length, and direction of the track. Get a practical introduction to many physics principles including gravitation, potential energy, kinetic energy, free fall, projectile motion, friction, centripetal force, velocity, acceleration, and more. Conduct a series of engineering challenges: What is the tallest roller coaster you can build? How about the longest straightaway? Can you build a loop-de-loop? A large, full-color manual guides you through the model assembly and experiments with step-by-step illustrated instructions. + Design and build your own working roller coaster models. + Conduct hands-on physics experiments to learn about force, motion, and energy. + Complete challenges that require you to build roller coasters of all shapes and sizes. + Plastic building system is durable, easy-to-assemble, and reusable. + Full-colour manual with step-by-step assembly instructions and scientific explanations Age 8+

products.title: Djeco Zig & Go Wroom 45-Piece Wooden Chain Reaction Building Game for Kids Ages 8+, Creative Marble Run Toy for Endless Fun and Learning
products.description: Zig & Go Wroom 45 Piece Chain Reaction Wooden Building Game for Endless Imaginative Play and STEM LearningGet ready for a wild ride of exciting experiments and amazing inventions with Zig & Go Wroom! This fantastic wooden building game from Djeco is more than just a toy; it's an adventure into the wonderful world of chain reactions and critical thinking, perfect for sparking curiosity in young minds. Imagine your child's delight as they meticulously arrange the 45 sturdy, FSC certified wooden pieces, including smooth metal marbles, to create their very own miniature Rube Goldberg-esque machines. This isn't just about building; it's about understanding cause and effect in a tangible, hands-on way that makes learning feel like pure magic. The Zig & Go Wroom kit comes packed with everything needed to get started. Inside, you'll find 45 durable wooden pieces, each designed for smooth movement and satisfying clicks as they interact, along with 5 gleaming metal marbles that will zip and zoom through the courses you create. To guide your initial explorations, there’s a helpful 24-page instruction booklet showcasing three different designs that demonstrate the core principles of the game. These step-by-step guides are perfect for introducing younger builders to the concepts of spatial reasoning and sequential logic. But the fun truly blossoms when children move beyond the instructions and begin to dream up their own ingenious contraptions. The possibilities are truly endless, limited only by a child's imagination. This game is expertly crafted to encourage a variety of crucial developmental skills. As children plan and assemble their courses, they are naturally engaging in problem-solving and developing their fine motor skills. They’ll learn to think critically about how weight affects speed and how to accurately gauge distances between elements to ensure a perfect cascade of movement. It’s a fantastic way to introduce the foundational principles of STEM in a way that’s incredibly engaging and enjoyable, all while playing. The game is designed for children aged 7 and up, making it a perfect activity for elementary schoolers who are ready for a delightful challenge. Plus, a QR code grants access to a helpful video, offering even more inspiration and guidance for your budding engineer. The beauty of the Zig & Go collection is that all the kits are compatible, meaning that as your child’s passion for chain reactions grows, they can seamlessly combine different sets to build ever more elaborate and spectacular courses, leading to hours upon hours of inventive, solo or group play. The FSC certified wood ensures that you’re making an eco-conscious choice for your family.

products.title: My First Coding and Robotics
products.description: My First Coding and Robotics is a brilliant starter kit to teach coding principles with a cute little robot. You don’t need a tablet, smartphone, or computer to program this robot; programs are created by simply laying down a sequence of physical code cards. As the robot drives over the code cards, an Optical identifier sensor or optical scanner on the bottom of the robot, reads the code cards one by one and loads the program. Next, place the robot on a grid made of map cards, and the robot runs the program. You can program the robot to move in different directions, activate its output gear, light up its LED, play sounds, and respond to different function cards. The integrated output gear makes it possible to build simple robotic creations with arms or other moving parts that respond according to the program’s instructions. This robot kit also teaches physical engineering and problem solving skills through a series of building and coding lessons. The 30 lessons are aligned with standards for computer science education developed by the Computer Science Teachers Association (CSTA) and the International Society for Technology (ISTE) Education, as well as courses from Code.org. The lessons or activities progress in complexity through the illustrated manual, allowing the kit to be appropriate for a child as young as four years with help from an adult and as old as eight years. The lessons cover these six key areas in coding: sequencing, loops, events, conditionals, functions, and variables. In addition to Sammy (the robot), there are five other stories, each with a series of model-building and coding challenges and lessons related to it: a mouse moves through a maze to find cheese; a penguin wanders around a zoo; a soccer player moves a ball into the goal; a fire truck puts out a fire; and a factory robot performs tasks in a factory scene. A full-colour illustrated manual guides users through the coding lessons and the assembly of the different models. Requires 3 AA batteries, supplied separately. Ages 4 to 8 years.

products.description: Practise mindfulness for kids with Pawz, The Calming Pup™, the light-up companion for children that’s also a night light. Squeeze Pawz’s foot and follow the lighting prompts that guide children through 3 breathing exercises for kids. Children inhale as Pawz gets brighter, and exhale as the light dims. Pawz has a built-in night light function that can be set for 5, 15, or 30 minutes. ollow along with Pawz, The Calming Pup’s guided breathing exercises for kids, inhaling as Pawz glows, and exhaling as the light dims. This calming companion guides children through 3 breathing patterns prompted by light: square breath (green light), 4x4 breath (blue light), and laddered breath (yellow light). This engaging breath activity encourages children to be fully present and bring awareness to their thoughts and feelings. It’s easy to get started. Squeeze Pawz's foot to turn on the light, and inhale as he glows, and exhale the light dims. Pawz also has a night light function with colour choices of white, green, blue, yellow, and purple, and a timer function which can be set to 5, 15, or 30 minutes.  Height: 48cm, Width: 48cm, Depth: 10cm.

products.title: Wow Toys Pip Pirate Ship
products.description:
Pip the Pirate Ship’s buccaneer water cannon adventures makes bath time extra exciting!

 Pip the Pirate Ship is a floating pirate ship bath toy and has features just waiting for little hands to discover at bath time.  Squeeze his attached red pump to squirt bath water straight out from his water cannon, it’s easy to aim – Bullseye!  His removable pirate skull and crossbones sail also doubles up as a scoop and water pourer or ‘splasher’ if that’s what you prefer to do! He comes with a removable pirate boy figure complete with pirate hat, eye patch and a green parrot on his shoulder.  Ahoy there!

 Pip the Pirate Ship is a 4 Piece set and includes a floating pirate boat, removable scoop and pour sail and a water squirting ship’s cannon.

    
 * Suitable for children aged 1 - 5 years 
 * Encourages development of motor skills 
 * Inspires imaginative and creative role-play

What's even better is Playfoam never dries out, so children can display their masterpieces rather than having to put it all back in the box!

 
Children simply mould Playfoam into anything in their imagination before squashing it down and starting again, offering endless play opportunities.

 
Set of 20 individual 9cm pods in 8 vibrant colours, including sparkle
Possible colour transfer: Playfoam® may transfer colour stain to fabric and plastic. Stains can be removed from tabletops using olive oil.

This gives children a sense of achievement as they figure out the answers themselves.

Players take turns to solve the sums and fill their boards with yucky spell ingredients, from worm-infested cupcakes to brains and bogies! Featuring competitive gameplay, fun wizard characters and a broad range of simple and challenging sums, this spellbinding game is bound to be a favourite amongst conscientious parents and budding wizards!Age recommendation: 5-7 years

products.title: For the love of Bees Gift Pack
products.description:
Bundled to help the conservation of solitary bees and other pollinators, contains;

  
 * The Bee Barn 
 * Natural Nesting Hay 
 * A pack of nectar-rich Wildflower Seeds 
 * Our latest Conservation Guide on Bees 
 * Lovingly packed in our Gift Box  Firstly, For the love of Bees gift pack contains a charming, customer favourite ‘Bee Barn’. Produced from sustainably managed, wood, with a recycled second-life plastic frontage. Designed to attract, solitary bees and other species of pollinators and insects. The barn also offers shelter and a space to create homes for these creatures in the various sections. This Bee Barn comes in an attractive gift box and is easy to put up and maintain.

 Many other pollinators may nest in the bee barn, but they will require some nesting material. Nesting material can fit in the lower compartment. As they often like to adopt ready-made nests from other creatures, such as birds.

 Secondly, the bundle also contains natural nesting hay for the ‘Bee Barn’. As well as a pack of seeds to grow colourful nectar-rich wildflowers that attract and feed bees. Plus, our latest conservation guide on Bees.

 This Gift Bundle is the perfect gift for your nature-loving friends and family. You’ll be helping them create a cosy home for solitary bees in their gardens and outdoor spaces. Therefore, continuing the much-needed conservation of our friendly pollinators!

products.title: Learn Knitting Kit for Beginners: Create a Scarf, Pouch & Gloves with 300g Wool & Easy Step-by-Step Instructions - Fun Craft for Kids Aged 8+
products.description: Learn Knitting Kit: Unleash Your Inner Craft Master and Create Adorable Projects! Get ready for a fun-filled crafting adventure with the Learn Knitting Kit from Halilit, perfect for aspiring crafters aged 8 and up! This amazing hands-on kit is your ticket to mastering the delightful art of knitting, transforming simple yarn into cozy and charming creations. Imagine the pride you'll feel as you gift a beautifully handcrafted scarf, a handy pouch for treasures, or super stylish fingerless gloves, all made by your own talented hands! This kit breaks down the knitting process into three easy-to-follow, exciting steps. First, you'll dive into the magical world of finger knitting, a super simple technique that lets you create with just your fingers – it’s like magic! Once you’ve got the hang of that, you’ll move on to learning the joy of knitting with needles, discovering how to cast on stitches, knit them, and even master the art of changing colors to add vibrant flair to your projects. But that's not all! The final stage introduces you to the classic stocking stitch, the foundation for many wonderful knitted items, allowing you to create beautifully textured fabrics for your creations. This kit isn’t just about learning a skill; it’s about fostering creativity, developing fine motor skills, and building confidence with every stitch. It’s a fantastic way for families to spend quality time together, embarking on creative journeys that result in tangible, delightful projects you’ll be eager to show off. The kit provides everything you need to get started, making it an accessible and engaging way to explore a timeless craft. Get ready to unravel a world of yarn-tastic possibilities and create memories that last a lifetime, one loop at a time! It’s the perfect way to spend a rainy afternoon or a creative weekend, bringing smiles and handmade goodness to your home.

 Examine the composition of inks and dyes with chromatography experiments, where colours magically separate from one another on a filter paper disk. Explore the properties of water, soaps, and oils.

 Make fizzy reactions with acids and bases to dissolve shells and extinguish candles. Discover the invisible gas carbon dioxide and its very visible effects.

 The full-colour, 48-page manual guides inquisitive young chemists and their adult supervisors through safely conducting each of the 27 experiments.

products.title: Giant 45cm Articulated Skeleton Model with Organs & Experiments for Kids Ages 8+
products.description: Explore the Wonders of Anatomy: 45cm Human Skeleton Model with Interactive Organs and Experiments for Ages 8+ Unlock the mysteries of the human body with this fascinating 45cm Skeleton model, designed to engage young scientists and aspiring medical professionals. This comprehensive set goes beyond a static model, offering a truly interactive learning experience. The soft, dissectible organs allow for a hands-on exploration of internal anatomy, giving children a tangible understanding of how their bodies work. But the educational adventure doesn't stop there. The skeleton itself features phosphorescent bones, which glow in the dark, adding an exciting visual element and making nighttime anatomical discoveries possible. This kit is packed with 12 thrilling experiments that delve into the secrets of anatomy. Imagine cultivating your own bacteria, a hands-on lesson in microbiology, or creating realistic, slimy mucus to understand bodily secretions. The included stethoscope is a star feature, allowing children to listen to their own heartbeat, bringing the abstract concept of circulation to life. The set provides a detailed human body model with nine distinct organs, perfect for learning their names and functions. Assembling the 12-piece skeleton is a rewarding challenge that enhances fine motor skills and spatial reasoning. Transparent structures offer further insight into how organs fit within the body cavity. A sturdy base ensures the model remains upright for display and study. Beyond the core anatomical components, this kit is brimming with supplementary materials to enrich the learning experience. Green coloring adds a splash of realism to experiments, while a whistle can be used in conjunction with breathing mechanics. A blindfold can be used for sensory experiments or to focus intently on tactile exploration. For microbiology endeavors, the kit includes three petri dishes and tweezers for careful handling. A beaker and gelatin are provided for creating various simulations, such as the slimy mucus. An illustrated sheet serves as a guide, detailing the experiments and providing anatomical information. The 10 optical illusion cards offer a fun diversion and a chance to explore visual perception, adding another layer of scientific inquiry to the overall experience. This all-in-one kit, recommended for ages 8 and up, is a gateway to understanding the complex and incredible workings of the human body through play and discovery, fostering a lifelong interest in science and health. It's an ideal gift for curious minds, providing hours of educational entertainment and a solid foundation in anatomical knowledge.

products.title: Gecko Marble Run Starter Pack
products.description:
Gecko Run takes classic marble runs to the next level with new creative challenges and less restrictive building requirements. This innovative marble run uses a specially designed system of flexible tracks that does not require any support structures. Traditional marble runs require lots of pieces to create vertical height, but with Gecko Run, your doors, windows, cupboards, bookcases – virtually any smooth surface – become part of your track, allowing you to build higher with fewer pieces. 

 Attach the tracks to surfaces with the help of clever nano pads, which work like nanoscopic suction cups, to create a strong, but temporary bond. Because the pads are not glue-based, they can be quickly and easily repositioned many times without damaging adhesives or sticky residue. A quick wipe with a microfiber cloth will keep your pads ready for action! 

 The versatile tracks are made from renewable, durable, and sustainably sourced raw materials. Thanks to their wide range of motion and flexibility, you can create hills and jumps, and even turn corners to generate a limitless number of tricks and stunts. No two tracks are ever the same! Each unique configuration promotes hands-on experimentation, supports problem-solving through trial-and-error, develops motor skills, and encourages creativity for kids and their grown-ups! 

 The Gecko Run Starter Set includes everything you need to zip, zag, bounce, skip, and hurdle into an awesome engineering adventure. A 16-page illustrated manual guides you through setting up your first runs and teaches you how all the different elements work. Witness physics in action! Use independently or combine with any of the expansion packs.

  
 *  Intuitive: Tracks attach to smooth surfaces with the help of clever nano-adhesive pads that stick to smooth, vertical surfaces around your home
  
 * Mess-free: The pads are not glue-based and can be quickly and easily repositioned without leaving behind damage or sticky residue. 
 *  Open-Ended: Position in endless configurations on smooth surfaces 
  
 * Educational: Develop engineering and problem-solving skills, and see physics in action 
 * Tracks made from renewable raw materials 
 * Additional stunts available in expansion packs (sold separately)  Conduct an action-packed series of hands-on physics and engineering lessons with an easy, modular building system. Piece together the sturdy frame structures and then attach the flexible track to it to build and test endless roller coaster designs.

 Experiment by varying the weight of the cars and varying the slope, length, and direction of the track. Get a practical introduction to many physics principles including gravitation, potential energy, kinetic energy, free fall, projectile motion, friction, centripetal force, velocity, acceleration, and more.

 Conduct a series of engineering challenges: What is the tallest roller coaster you can build? How about the longest straightaway? Can you build a loop-de-loop? A large, full-color manual guides you through the model assembly and experiments with step-by-step illustrated instructions.

 + Design and build your own working roller coaster models.

 + Conduct hands-on physics experiments to learn about force, motion, and energy.

 + Complete challenges that require you to build roller coasters of all shapes and sizes.

 + Plastic building system is durable, easy-to-assemble, and reusable.

 + Full-colour manual with step-by-step assembly instructions and scientific explanations

 Age 8+

products.title: Djeco Cinderella Story Jigsaw Puzzle - 54 pcs - Magic Fairytale Puzzle with Characters & Poster - Storytelling & Playtime Fun - 38x50cm
products.description: Cinderella Story Jigsaw Puzzle - 54 pcs - Enchanting Fairytale Adventures Step into a world of magic and wonder with the Cinderella Story Jigsaw Puzzle, a delightful 54-piece adventure designed to spark imagination and family fun. This isn't just any puzzle; it's a portal to one of the most beloved fairytales, presented in a captivating silent comic format that invites little ones to create their own narratives. Imagine the joy on your child's face as they discover the steps of Cinderella's magical journey, from humble beginnings to her grand ball, all through vibrant, engaging illustrations. The premium quality cardboard ensures this puzzle can be assembled countless times, offering endless opportunities for cooperative play and storytelling. It’s more than just a pastime; it's a tool for developing fine motor skills, problem-solving abilities, and a rich vocabulary as you and your child invent new dialogue and plot twists. The included poster serves as a helpful guide, making assembly accessible for younger hands, and also doubles as a beautiful piece of wall art for a child's bedroom, a constant reminder of the enchanting story. But that's not all, this set comes with three adorable cardboard characters that can be brought to life for even more interactive play, allowing children to re-enact their favorite scenes or create entirely new Cinderella adventures beyond the puzzle itself. This Djeco masterpiece is thoughtfully designed for children aged 4 and up, offering a screen-free way to engage with classic stories and foster a love for learning and creativity. The puzzle itself, once completed, measures a generous 38 x 50 cm, providing a satisfyingly large image to admire. The included poster measures 26 x 34 cm, a perfect size for a tabletop guide or display. This puzzle is crafted from durable, child-safe cardboard, built to withstand enthusiastic play. Its elegant, decorative box makes it a wonderful gift and a lovely addition to any playroom or child's bedroom, ready to store the pieces and become a cherished item. It's perfect for rainy days, quiet afternoons, or as a collaborative family activity that creates lasting memories. Prepare for giggles and storytelling as you embark on this classic fairytale adventure together, transforming puzzle time into a magical, memorable experience for the whole family. The silent comic style truly allows for open-ended play and encourages a child’s narrative skills to flourish.

products.title: Planetarium Projector: Create a Space Theatre with Authentic Star Maps & Cosmic Images, Features 2 Projections & Auto-Off Timer for Fun Family Nights
products.description: Cosmic Creator Planetarium Projector Turn Your Room into an Interstellar Adventure Get ready for an out-of-this-world experience right in your own home with the Thames and Kosmos Planetarium Projector. This fantastic gadget transforms any room into your personal cosmos, perfect for sparking wonder and imagination in every member of the family. Imagine drifting off to sleep under a canopy of twinkling stars, each one precisely mapped to the northern and southern hemispheres, creating an astronomically accurate celestial display. But that's just the beginning of the magic! This isn't just one projector, it's two brilliant projectors working together to bring the universe to you. The first projector offers that captivating rotating star map, immersing you in the vastness of space. The second projector is your gateway to a dazzling array of space-themed images, showcasing all eight planets in our solar system, impressive human-made marvels like mighty rockets and intricate satellites soaring through the void, and breathtaking extragalactic wonders such as vibrant nebulae and majestic galaxies. With focusable lenses, you can adjust the clarity of these cosmic visions to be perfectly crisp and clear. Want to keep the wonder going without staying up all night? The ingenious nightlight mode allows you to set an auto-off timer for 15, 30, or 60 minutes, gently lulling you or your little astronauts to sleep. This projector boasts long-lasting LED lights that provide brilliant illumination without excessive heat. It's designed with your space in mind too, featuring a compact and space-saving design that can easily sit on any flat surface or even be conveniently hung on a wall. Included in the box is a colourful educational poster, a handy instruction sheet to guide your celestial exploration, and an incredible collection of 4 image disks, each containing 8 spectacular space-related images, bringing your total cosmic image count to a whopping 32! You'll also discover a clever storage compartment built right into the projector for keeping your image disks organized and ready for your next adventure. This projector also offers dynamic color settings for a truly immersive experience. The built-in speaker allows you to play your favorite space-themed music or narration for an even more engaging show, enhancing the educational and entertainment value of this amazing device. Discover the wonders of the universe with this all-in-one cosmic projector that promises endless fun and learning for the whole family.

products.title: Wind Power Turbine STEM Kit: Build 3ft Turbine, Generate Electricity, Charge Batteries, Learn Renewable Energy - Ages 8-14+
products.description: Explore the incredible power of the wind with the Wind Power Turbine Kit, an engaging and educational experience for aspiring young scientists aged 8 and up! This fantastic hands-on kit from Thames and Kosmos invites your family on an exciting journey to understand and harness clean, renewable energy. Imagine building your very own realistic wind turbine, complete with an electric generator and adjustable rotor blades meticulously crafted with complex aerodynamic curves, just like the ones you see powering communities today. You'll get to experiment with these finely tuned blades, discovering how adjusting their angle can optimize your turbine's performance, making it spin faster and generate more power. It's a wonderful way to learn about the science of aerodynamics firsthand! But that's not all; this kit goes even further, allowing you to discover how your wind turbine can light up an LED, demonstrating the direct conversion of wind energy into electricity, and even charge a rechargeable battery, storing that valuable power for later use. Get ready for even more innovation as you can convert the generator into an electric motor! This opens up a whole new dimension of learning as you assemble a small electric car, showcasing a tangible and fun application for the electricity you've captured. See firsthand how wind energy can lead to exciting motion! The kit comes with a vibrant, full-colour 32-page manual that's packed with easy-to-follow illustrated instructions. Beyond the building, this comprehensive manual delves into fascinating scientific information, exploring the diverse types of wind turbines and windmills, the rich history of this vital technology, and the amazing ways wind energy can be used to power our homes and even electric cars of the future. It's a treasure trove of knowledge designed to spark curiosity and a love for science in the whole family. With this kit, you're not just building a model; you're building understanding, innovation, and a connection to a sustainable future, all in a fun and engaging way.

products.title: Thames and Kosmos Simple Machines | Young Engineering STEM Toys
products.description: Learn the fun foundational physics of simple machines! Jumpstart your study of mechanical physics by learning all about simple machines and how they’re used to make complex tasks easier to do. Through 26 model-building exercises, you’ll investigate all 6 classic simple machines — wheels and axles, levers, pulleys, inclined planes, screws, and wedges — as well as gears. Start off with simple models to guarantee a firm understanding of the basic principles at play, and then move onto larger, more complex models to push the machines harder and see how they can work together. Also included is a specially designed spring scale so that you can measure how the machines change the direction and magnitude of forces, making work easier to do. With this durable, modular construction system, you can see how the same basic elements combine in different ways to form each machine. The models can be assembled and disassembled again and again; combine the pieces to create your own configurations, limited only by your imagination! In addition to the invaluable hands-on experience you’ll get from model building, the 32-page, full-colour manual also dives into examples of simple machines in action in everyday life. The seesaw at the playground, the wheelbarrow in your backyard, the flagpole in front of your school — all of these are examples of simple machines in the real world! So start building, investigating, and experimenting to discover how physics is all around us! Age 8+

products.title: GeoSafari Jr. My First Microscope
products.description:
Discover the hidden and wonderful world of small things. Look at plants, rocks or insects with up to 8x magnification. The chunky design of this fully functional microscope is designed especially for little hands and is perfect as a child's first microscope.

 GeoSafari Jr. My First Microscope is ideal for investigating paper, cloth, plants, hair or paper. Easy-to-use, it features two large eyepieces, eliminating the need to close one eye, and an LED light to enhance the clarity of the image. All the images appear right-side up and left-right correct for easy understanding.

 Using GeoSafari Jr. My First Microscope 

 Install three AAA batteries as shown on page 4 in this guide. Place an object on the specimen tray. Switch on the light. Show your child how to look through the eyepieces and turn the focusing knob. Encourage them to find different items and examine them under the microscope. Some interesting things to observe include: toys, money, leaves, cloth, paper, and food. Ask your child to tell you how the item looks different under the microscope and what details he or she notices. Have paper and pencils available for your child to draw how the item looks both with and without the microscope.

 Contents

  
 * 8x Magnification microscope 
 * LED light for detailed views 
 * 2 Extra-large eyepieces

products.title: Newton’s Apple: Tightrope-Walking Gyrobot
products.description: An apple that defies gravity and walks a tightrope — what would Isaac Newton have thought? Build a cute apple robot that walks along a tightrope. How? Through five experiments, you can discover the astonishing powers of the motorized gyroscope and explore the physics behind its amazing behaviors. Experiment with getting the gyrobot to walk on the different included tracks and on a string, investigate the gyrobot’s center of gravity, play a ring-toss game, and watch the gyrobot spin on a flat surface Through 8 experiments, you can explore the astonishing powers of the motorised gyroscope and understand the physics behind its amazing behaviours. Experiment with getting the robot to walk on different surfaces: a tightrope, on a solid tabletop, on a soft surface, and even on your arm! You can also experiment with the balancing behaviour of the motorised gyroscope by itself, testing its ability to balance on its edge, on your finger, on a pole, and dangling from a string. Build a one-of-a-kind apple robot that defies gravity! Thanks to the robot’s main component, a motorized gyroscope, this special apple can walk along a tightrope without falling. Explore the physics behind this scientific device through five unique experiments that investigate gravity. The unique and functional design makes this an affordable, fun, and educational gift with high play value. The kit includes parts to build the gyrobot and experimental setups, including a track to walk around. By constructing the robot and performing the experiments with the motorised gyroscope unit, young engineers can learn about the science of gyroscopic devices and the indispensable role they play in our lives. products.title: The Genius Star
products.description: The Genius Star! Play solo, or race an opponent to fill the star! The aim of each of the 165,888 possible puzzles is to complete the star using the eleven coloured shapes, once the seven ‘blockers’ have been positioned. There may be times when it seems impossible, but there will ALWAYS be at least one solution... and that’s why it’s called The Genius Star! Roll the seven dice and place a ‘blocker’ piece into the triangle matching the seven numbers that appear on the faces. Now race your opponent to fill every other space on the grid using the 11 shapes. There is also a wonderful new twist to each challenge, in the shape of a ‘Golden Star’. Will you play safe and complete a regular win, or will you go for a double win, by completing the challenge with the ‘Golden Star’ in one piece? Only 57.4% of the puzzles actually have a solution with the ‘Golden Star’ whole, so it’s a tough decision to make. You’ll need speed of thought... and nerves of steel! There’s also a web page where you can input your coordinates and find out whether the ‘Golden Star’ can be completed in one piece! Age 8+

products.title: Butterfly Garden Kit with live voucher
products.description:
Our fabulous Butterfly Garden Kit is supplied with a voucher for live caterpillars which is great if you are buying for a gift or not sure when you want to start raising your butterfly family. (Your gift recipient will have nothing extra to pay to redeem the voucher!)

 This educational kit gives children the opportunity to watch close up the miracle of 'Metamorphosis'. Observe caterpillars change into chrysalides and then emerge as beautiful Painted Lady Butterflies.

 The Live Butterfly Garden Kit Includes:

  
 * Pop-up, reusable 30cm tall mesh Butterfly Garden habitat perfect for butterfly viewing! 
 * Feeding Pipette 
 * Complete Instructions 
 * Certificate for live caterpillars, with free P&P 
 * NB The live caterpillars are sent out between March and mid September 
 *  PLEASE do NOT pay for the delivery of these caterpillars, it is included in the price you have already paid!  Your caterpillars will arrive in a clear plastic cup with all of the nutritious food they need. Keep the cup in a safe place away from direct sunlight. The caterpillars will remain in the cup and will eat, spin silk and grow to TEN times their original size! After seven to ten days they will hang upside down and harden into pupae.

 Raise Your Very Own Butterflies and Release into the Wild


 Once the pupae have hardened, gently move them to the pop-up butterfly habitat which you can make realistic with stalks and flowers. It will take about seven to ten more days for them to complete the transformation to adult butterflies. By which stage your children will be just so excited!

products.title: Hydropower Renewable Energy Science Kit
products.description:
Hydropower has been used for hundreds of years in watermills and is now commonly used to generate electricity in applications such as hydroelectric dams and tidal power plants.

 Explore the power of water by building models and conducting experiments with them. Learn about how different devices are used to extract useful energy from moving water — from a waterwheel in a small stream to a giant turbine in a tidal power station.

 Build a waterwheel, a sawmill, and a hammer mill to harness the energy of moving water to do different types of physical work. Investigate the intriguing properties of water by performing experiments involving surface tension, adhesion, and cohesion. Learn about water pressure by building a water tower, communicating vessels, and a water fountain.

 Construct a hydroelectric power station to generate electricity and light an LED. Learn about where the energy in ocean waves, tides, and rivers comes from, and discover how we can generate electricity from them.

 The full-colour, 32-page experiment manual offers illustrated instructions and scientific information.

 Ages 8+

products.title: Diditrike - Zebra
products.description:
The Diditrike baby and toddler trike from Didicar is a unique, early year's ride on toy. Ideal for encouraging young children to explore their gross motor skills. It has been intricately designed to provide ultimate support and stability as little ones improve their mobility. With smooth wheels and an easy to manoeuvre handle bar, this ride on toy glides along for seamless play.

 The baby trike's freewheeling design allows for some serious whizzing around providing exercise whilst developing spatial awareness, speed awareness, balance and gross motor skills. Its quirky, cute design makes for engaging play. The Diditrike is lightweight, durable and features no pedals or batteries. It is suitable for use indoors and outdoors on any smooth, flat surface.

 Features a soft handle bar and hard seat. There are four funky designs including available a Crocodile, Ladybird, Zebra and a Giraffe. Suitable for riders up to 20KG. Age 12+ months. Seat height 24cm. Height: 39cm, Width: 23cm, Length: 53cm.

 * Choose from a variety of parts and pieces, including vehicle parts, wheels, a propeller, and bulldozer scoop to build a car, airplane, bulldozer, helicopter, or crazy custom build. 
 * Then use the drill and colourful bolts to attach them in any configuration, driving home fine motor skills, creativity, early engineering, and STEM skills while you build.

products.title: Cambridge Brainbox Primary 2 Electronics Kit
products.description:
Brainbox is a simple 'Plug and Play' electronics kit with all parts designed for quick and easy assembly. The components are connected with press-studs, making them suitable for all abilities.

 The Cambridge Brainbox 100 Primary 2 Kit is designed to teach children the basic principles of electricity and electronics in a fun way. The Primary 2 Kit is suitable for use in the classroom or the home and has a great manual perfect for parents and teachers.

 
Cambridge Brainbox Primary 2 Electronics Kit covers the requirements of the Science National Curriculum at Key Stages 1 & 2 with links to Design and Technology and adds many extra exciting experiments for good measure!

 
Due to the ease of construction, students are quickly rewarded and if the circuit does not work first time, it is easy to rebuild it.

 
For younger children, the brightly coloured parts makes it very easy to identify what goes where. The manual uses both block diagrams and circuit symbols, so students soon learn how to understand and interpret circuit diagrams.



  
 * Robust, brightly coloured and number coded parts help construction 
 * Over 100 experiments to build understanding 
 * Learn about and design Electric circuits 
 * Find out how to control the brightness of lamps 
 * Learn about and use different types of switches 
 * Experiment with an electric motor 
 * Experiment with conductors and insulators 
 * Find out how to use light emitting diodes 
 * Learn about series and parallel circuits 
 * Find out about AND and OR gates 
 * Build a flying fan 
 * Produce electronic sirens   

 Requires 4 AA batteries.

 Age 7 to 11 years.

products.title: Pop to the Shops Shopping Game for Kids 5-9 Years - Learn Money Skills with Fun Play Money & Playful Shopping Adventure!
products.description: Pop to the Shops Shopping Game A Fantastic Family Board Game for Aspiring Shopkeepers and Savvy Shoppers. Step right up to a wonderfully vibrant and engaging shopping adventure with the Pop to the Shops Shopping Game! This delightful board game invites families to dive into the exciting world of commerce, where every player can take on the role of either a customer or a shopkeeper. Imagine the fun as you become a cheerful baker with a basket full of fresh bread, a helpful newsagent stocking all the latest papers, a friendly greengrocer with a rainbow of fruits and vegetables, or perhaps even a bustling shopkeeper managing your very own store! Players will have a blast as they navigate the colourful game board, their mission to buy and sell a variety of everyday items. It’s a fantastic way to foster imagination and role-playing skills as children learn to interact with each other in a playful marketplace setting. But the fun doesn't stop there! For an extra touch of realism and excitement, children can use their very own purses to keep their hard-earned game money safe and sound. This adds a personal and tangible element to the play, making every transaction feel even more significant. The Pop to the Shops Shopping Game is more than just a fun way to spend an afternoon; it's an excellent tool for developing essential money handling skills. Little ones will joyfully practise counting coins, making purchases, and mastering the art of giving change. It’s a brilliant, hands-on introduction to basic financial literacy that’s disguised as pure entertainment. Beyond the practical skills, the game also subtly encourages good manners and polite interaction, fostering a positive social environment as everyone plays together. Designed for ages 5 to 9 years, this game offers hours of educational and interactive fun for siblings and parents alike. The high-quality components are designed for little hands, and the gameplay is intuitive and engaging, ensuring that everyone from the youngest to the oldest will be entertained. Get ready to pop to the shops for an unforgettable family game night!

products.title: City of Zombies Maths Game
products.description:
City of Zombies - The Ultimate Edition (4th Edition)
 
 Winner: Best Family Board Game, Best Maths Game, Excelled in Schools, Dice Tower Seal of Approval, Recommended by National Numeracy.
 
 City of Zombies is a co-operative board game for 1 to 6 players. Players play together, against the game to win.
 
 The aim of the game is to stop your Barricade from being overrun, holding the Zombies off until the Rescue Plane can land, and players win.
 
 Players take it in turn to roll and combine dice making a total that matches a Zombie's strength to remove it from play. 
 
 Multiple Zombies can be defeated this way on one players turn.
 
 Clear the board of Zombies and you can save human survivors from the City. The more survivors you save, the better your end-game score will be, but beware! Allow Zombies to reach your Barricade and you will lose survivors, and if six Zombies are on the Barricade then it's Game Over!
 
 Originally developed to assist the designer's maths adverse daughter with her maths, City of Zombies is a fast and fun way to improve numeracy.
 
 It is non-threatening, builds confidence and encourages learning by rewarding players as their skill improve.
 
 The Ultimate Edition adds 4 levels of play to suit all maths abilities; Beginner, Advanced, Expert and Master.
 
 It's simple to pick up and play thanks to the included step-by-step guide and illustrated rules booklet.
 
 City of Zombies can be played in as little as 20 minutes (short version).
 
 The Ultimate Edition introduces negative number Zombies and Cubing.
 
 Contents:

  
 * Illustrated, step by step guide and Rule booklet 
 * 3 Battle Dice 
 * Rescue Plane Turn counter 
 * Level 1 - 4 Zombie cards 
 * 18 Hero cards (9 Boys, 9 Girls) each with a ’Special Power Move' 
 * 2 x ’Transformation’ Hero cards 
 * Survivor cards 
 * Event cards 
 * Item cards 
 * Game Board  Perfect for Key Stage 2 Mental Maths revision.
 Play-time 20 to 45 mins.
 Age 5 to Adult

This activity centre is more than just a toy; it's a fantastic companion for curious minds, encouraging them to explore, learn, and grow through engaging play. Crafted with care from high-quality, sustainable wood sourced from ethically managed FSC certified forests, this activity centre ensures a safe and eco-conscious playtime experience. Its smooth finish is coated with non-toxic, child-friendly paint, providing peace of mind for parents. Designed for children aged 12 months and up, this robust activity centre meets current ASTM F963 and European safety standards, guaranteeing its durability and safety. Immerse your child in a world of vibrant learning as they discover the engaging features on each of the five sides. They can delight in manipulating the colourful animal blocks, each designed to introduce different creatures and foster early recognition. Spin the alphabet squares and watch as letters magically appear, laying the foundation for future literacy in a playful manner. Sorting the adorable animal faces becomes a thrilling challenge, honing their observation and matching skills. As they progress, the built-in abacus with its smooth sliding beads offers a wonderful introduction to counting and basic number concepts, transforming math into a playful game. The thoughtful inclusion of a chalkboard invites budding artists to unleash their creativity with chalk, while the number and picture blocks are perfect for developing fine motor skills as they are matched and placed. We know how important it is to keep little hands busy safely, and that's why there are absolutely no detachable pieces on this activity centre, ensuring a secure and worry-free playtime for everyone. This innovative wooden activity centre is a powerhouse for developing dexterity and coordination, allowing little hands to develop their grip and control through a variety of tactile and manipulative activities. It’s a brilliant way to build crucial early developmental skills while having an absolute blast.

Intro to Tools & Building is a fun and engaging way to teach simple engineering concepts to young children, allowing parents, teachers, and caregivers to lay the groundwork for strong STEM-related skills and comprehension at an early age.
