products.title: Collective Nouns Card Game for Kids & Adults - Fun English Grammar Learning with Antonyms, Proverbs & Homonyms
products.description: BrightMinds Collective Nouns Fun Learning Game - Expand Your Vocabulary and Grammar Skills Embark on a delightful adventure into the fascinating world of language with the BrightMinds Collective Nouns Fun Learning Game! This engaging game is designed to make mastering tricky English grammar an absolute joy for the whole family. Forget dull drills; this is where learning becomes an exciting challenge that even grown-ups will love to tackle. Inside this vibrant game box, you'll discover a treasure trove of 52 beautifully illustrated cards, each representing a collective noun ready to be matched with its corresponding group. Imagine the fun of pairing "a pride of lions" or "a gaggle of geese"! Not only will you be forming fantastic pairs, but the game also conveniently includes a list of all the correct pairings, so everyone can check their answers and celebrate their triumphs. This isn't just a game; it's a powerful tool for building a stronger vocabulary and a deeper understanding of the nuances of the English language. It’s perfect for quiet afternoons, lively family game nights, or even as a fun educational activity during holidays. The colorful and durable cards are designed to withstand countless hours of play, ensuring that the learning fun continues for years to come. This particular game from BrightMinds is part of a fantastic series, so after you've become a collective noun champion, you can explore their equally engaging Antonyms, Proverbs, and Homonyms games for even more linguistic exploration. The collective nouns game is a wonderful way to encourage communication, critical thinking, and a lifelong love of words in children and adults alike. It's an excellent way to subtly reinforce grammar concepts without feeling like homework, making it a popular choice for parents, educators, and anyone looking to add a playful twist to language learning. Get ready to impress everyone with your newfound knowledge of how to describe groups of animals, people, and things! This game offers a fantastic screen-free entertainment option that fosters learning and connection, making it an ideal addition to any family's game collection. Discover the joy of learning together and watch as your family's linguistic skills soar to new heights with this delightful and educational game.

products.description: Tap Tap Vehicles by Djeco A Delightful Wooden Toy for Budding Engineers and Creative Minds Unveiling a world of imaginative vehicle creation for your little ones, the Tap Tap Vehicles set from Djeco is more than just a toy it’s an engaging and educational adventure waiting to happen. This playschool classic has been lovingly reimagined by Djeco to help children aged 4 and up develop their fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination in the most delightful way. Imagine the joy on their faces as they become master mechanics, constructing their very own colorful cars and robust trucks. The set comes complete with 24 beautifully illustrated and perforated wooden pieces, each waiting to be brought to life. Children will carefully place these pieces onto the thick, durable cork board, and then with a satisfying tap-tap-tap of the included child-safe wooden hammer, they’ll gently secure them in place using the small nails. This hands-on approach fosters a sense of accomplishment and encourages problem-solving as they navigate how to make their creations stand tall and proud. The magic doesn't stop at simple construction. To spark their creativity and provide a helpful starting point, the set includes 5 vibrant template cards. These cards showcase a variety of wonderful vehicles that children can choose to replicate, or they can choose to venture off the beaten path and let their imaginations run wild, designing entirely new vehicles that are unique to them. The possibilities are truly endless, promoting open-ended play and endless hours of fun. Everything needed for this automotive adventure is neatly and thoughtfully organized within a charming, durable wooden box. This isn't just any box; it's a well-designed storage solution with clever compartments, ensuring that all 24 wooden pieces, the nails, the cork board, the wooden hammer, and the template cards are kept together at the end of playtime. This makes tidying up a breeze and ensures the toy is ready for the next creative session. Crafted with quality materials, including a substantial cork board and sturdy wooden components, this toy is built to last and withstand the enthusiastic play of energetic youngsters. The tactile nature of the wood and the satisfying sound of the tapping provide a sensory-rich experience that’s both calming and stimulating. products.title: Newton’s Apple: Tightrope-Walking Gyrobot
products.description:
An apple that defies gravity and walks a tightrope — what would Isaac Newton have thought? Build a cute apple robot that walks along a tightrope. How? Thanks to the robot’s main component, a motorized gyroscope, it can maintain its balance and perform this fun trick without falling over.

 Through five experiments, you can discover the astonishing powers of the motorized gyroscope and explore the physics behind its amazing behaviors. Experiment with getting the gyrobot to walk on the different included tracks and on a string, investigate the gyrobot’s center of gravity, play a ring-toss game, and watch the gyrobot spin on a flat surface

 Through 8 experiments, you can explore the astonishing powers of the motorised gyroscope and understand the physics behind its amazing behaviours. Experiment with getting the robot to walk on different surfaces: a tightrope, on a solid tabletop, on a soft surface, and even on your arm! You can also experiment with the balancing behaviour of the motorised gyroscope by itself, testing its ability to balance on its edge, on your finger, on a pole, and dangling from a string.

  
 * Build a one-of-a-kind apple robot that defies gravity! 
 * Thanks to the robot’s main component, a motorized gyroscope, this special apple can walk along a tightrope without falling. 
 * Explore the physics behind this scientific device through five unique experiments that investigate gravity. 
 * The unique and functional design makes this an affordable, fun, and educational gift with high play value. 
 * The kit includes parts to build the gyrobot and experimental setups, including a track to walk around. 
 * By constructing the robot and performing the experiments with the motorised gyroscope unit, young engineers can learn about the science of gyroscopic devices and the indispensable role they play in our lives. 
 * A full-colour, 8-page, illustrated experiment manual provides step-by-step assembly instructions and scientific explanations.  Requires: 3 x AAA Batteries (Not Included)

 Ages 8 to 14 years.

products.title: Express Your Feelings Sensory Bottles
products.description:
Shake, swirl and twirl your way to understanding and managing your feelings with the innovative Express Your Feelings Sensory Bottles. Through their colour, fun facial expressions and the motion of their contents, each of the 4 interactive bottles in this set embodies a unique emotion. There's happy, sad, scared or angry. Happy has gold glitter, sad has a slow motion lava lamp-like effect, angry is red, and scared is green. These fun bottles give children a self-directed, tangible way to identify, understand and navigate their feelings. They are securely sealed and sized for little hands, which makes them ideal for use at home, in the classroom, in a calming corner, and on the go.

 Whether happy, sad, scared, or angry, the simple expressions, colours, and motion in each of the 4 mesmerising sensory bottles in this set help children identify and express their feelings and emotions.

  
 * Use these in the classroom or at home to help children practise self-awareness, self-management, and social awareness. 
 * Each bottle features an expression, and is filled with liquid and material to create a flowing action that represents the emotion. 
 * Happy includes gold glitter, sad has a slow-motion lava lamp-like effect, angry is red, and scared is green. Move the bottles around and watch the mesmerising motion of the liquid and colour inside. 
 * Each child-safe bottle is permanently sealed and easy for little hands to grasp and control. 
 * Includes an Activity Guide. 
 * Expand the learning with other sets (sold separately). There's Excited, Nervous, Lonely and Impatient (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/express-your-feelings-sensory-bottles-excited-nervous-lonely-impatient), and Opposites: Overwhelmed and Calm (https://www.learningresources.co.uk/express-your-feelings-sensory-bottles-opposites-overwhelmed-and-calm).   Age 3+

products.title: Djeco Zig & Go Big Boom 48 pcs Wooden Building Game - Fun Chain Reaction Toy for Kids 7+, Create Endless Courses!
products.description: Zig & Go Big Boom 48 Piece Chain Reaction Building Game for Imaginative Fun Get ready for explosive creativity and captivating fun with the Zig & Go Big Boom 48 piece set from Djeco! This isn't just any building game; it's a thrilling journey into the world of chain reactions where thoughtful planning and imaginative design come to life. Inside this wonderfully crafted set, you'll discover 48 high-quality wooden pieces, all FSC certified for peace of mind, alongside 5 gleaming metal marbles that will be the stars of your spectacular domino-style courses. The adventure begins with a colorful 24-page instruction booklet that features three fantastic designs to spark your building genius. These designs are perfect for copying and understanding the amazing physics of cause and effect. But that's just the beginning! The real magic unfolds when you start creating your very own courses, the possibilities are truly endless, offering hours upon hours of engaging entertainment for the whole family. This game is specifically designed for young masterminds aged 7 and above, nurturing their problem-solving skills and encouraging them to think critically about how different weights and distances will affect the speed and flow of their creations. As children meticulously position each piece, they're developing valuable construction skills. Then, when the marbles start rolling, they witness the ingenious and magical chain of movements firsthand, learning about physics in a hands-on, exciting way. The process encourages deep thinking as they consider momentum and gravity, turning simple wood into a spectacle of motion. For even more spectacular setups, all kits within the Zig & Go collection are designed to be compatible, allowing you to expand your chain reaction world with new challenges and elaborate designs. If you ever need a little extra guidance or inspiration, a special QR code is provided, unlocking access to helpful videos that demonstrate the amazing capabilities of these sets. Whether you're playing solo and concentrating on perfecting a complex cascade, or collaborating with friends and family to build the most epic course imaginable, the Zig & Go Big Boom set promises collaborative fun and individual discovery. It's more than just a toy; it's an educational tool that makes learning about physics and engineering an absolute delight.

products.description: Djeco Do It Yourself - 4 Tiaras Like a Princess: Sparkle and Shine with Your Own Royal Creations Get ready for a dazzling adventure with the Djeco Do It Yourself - 4 Tiaras Like a Princess kit, a magical crafting experience designed to bring out the inner royalty in every child! This enchanting set empowers little ones to become their own royal jewelers, crafting four magnificent tiaras fit for any princess. The kit is brimming with sparkling materials to transform plain cardstock into shimmering crowns. Imagine the joy as children carefully peel and place an array of colorful, glittering mosaic foam stickers and radiant gemstone stickers, following the simple numbered guides. Each sticker placement is a step towards creating a dazzling masterpiece that truly shines, just like a diamond. These aren't just any stickers; the glitter mosaic foam stickers add a soft, textured sparkle, while the gemstone stickers offer a brilliant, multifaceted shine, making each tiara uniquely glamorous. The beauty of this kit lies in its simplicity and the incredible results. Children aged 5 and up can easily dive into this activity, fostering creativity and fine motor skills as they meticulously decorate their princess crowns. The included instructions offer clear, step-by-step creative tips, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable crafting journey from start to finish. Once adorned, these beautiful tiaras aren't just for display; they're an invitation to step into a world of fairy tales and royal play. Children can don their creations and embark on imaginative quests, host royal tea parties, or simply enjoy the feeling of wearing something they made themselves. This kit is not only fun but also thoughtfully made with the environment in mind, crafted from FSC certified paper and cardboard, a testament to responsible sourcing. The vibrant illustrations on the cardstock tiaras provide a lovely base, while the abundant sticker sets ensure plenty of creative freedom. You'll find 4 beautifully illustrated cardstock tiaras, 3 sets of glitter mosaic foam stickers in various captivating colors, 4 sets of shimmering gemstone stickers to add that extra special sparkle, and 4 elegant gilded ribbons to complete the regal look. This is the perfect activity for birthdays, playdates, or just a wonderful way to spend an afternoon creating something special. The act of decorating and then playing with the finished product offers a delightful sense of accomplishment and sparks endless imaginative play. The textures of the foam stickers and the brilliance of the gemstones combine to create a truly luxurious feel for these child-made treasures. This hands-on experience is designed to be engaging and rewarding, making every child feel like a true princess with her very own custom-designed tiara. It’s more than just a craft; it’s an experience of creation and imaginative play, bringing smiles and a touch of royal magic to any day.

products.title: Electricity & Magnetism 60 Experiments
products.description: Conduct more than 60 electrifying experiments with circuits and magnetic contraptions to learn about electricity and magnetism, and how these two fundamental properties are closely related. Children eight and up can safely and easily experiment with electric current and magnetic fields using the colourful snap-together blocks and components in this hands-on kit. Build series and parallel circuits to light up a light bulb. Experiment with push buttons and on-off switches. Assemble circuits that include a spinning motor, two switches, and up to three light bulbs. Conduct tests to see which materials are magnetic. Learn about the force of magnetism and magnetic poles. Magnetise a metal. Use iron fillings to make invisible magnetic fields visible. Investigate magnetic force and direction with a magnetic pendulum device. Learn how a compass works and about Earth’s magnetic fields. Conduct a series of experiments with a sturdy electromagnet. Finally, put everything you have learned to good use by constructing a loudspeaker, an electromagnetic relay switch, and a morse code telegraph key. The components are specially designed to make learning fun and accessible. The electrical blocks fit together with simple plug and- socket connectors. Because the blocks are brightly coloured and have unique shapes, it is easy to follow the assembly diagrams to construct functional devices. The 64-page, full-colour experiment manual guides you through experiments with easy-to follow diagrams. Age 8+

products.title: Chem Lab C1000 Thames and Kosmos
products.description:
Enroll in CHEM C1000 and prepare for a lifetime of fascination with this essential science through 128 diverse experiments. Start with an introduction to the field of chemistry and famous chemists. Set up your lab space and learn how to safely handle the lab equipment and chemicals.

 Learn about indicators with litmus solution and write a secret message in invisible ink. Test the inks from your coloured markers on the chromatography racetrack to reveal their different colour components. Experiment with air pressure, surface tension, and the physical properties of fluids.

 Experiment with two well-known metals, iron and copper. Investigate carbon dioxide. Dissolve metals with electrochemical reactions. Explore water and its elements, saturated and unsaturated solutions, and crystals. Split water into hydrogen and oxygen with electrolysis, and form oxygen from hydrogen peroxide.

 Experiment with soaps, detergents, and emulsions of water and oil. Investigate chemistry in the kitchen by experimenting with sugar, honey, starch, eggs and proteins, fatty acids, and calcium.

 Begin to build a strong foundation in chemistry with exposure to a broad range of chemical phenomena and hands-on laboratory experiences. This kit provides clear instructions for preparing and performing the experiments, offers safety advice, offers explanations for the observed occurrences, and asks and answers questions about the results.

 Thorough safety precautions and instructions ensure safe experimentation. Professional quality equipment helps you make the most of your chemistry experiments. The 80-page, full-colour experiment manual guides aspiring young chemists through each of the 128 experiments. 


  
 Age 10 and above

products.description: Djeco Do It Yourself - Constellations: Discover the Magic of the Night Sky with this Amazing Craft Kit! Get ready for an out-of-this-world adventure right in your own home with the Djeco Do It Yourself Constellations kit! This fantastic hands-on activity is designed for curious minds aged 7 and up, inviting them to become their very own cosmic explorers. Inside this wonderful box, you'll discover everything you need to create a mesmerizing constellation viewer and bring the celestial wonders to life. Imagine punching out tiny, perfect stars on beautifully designed cards, each representing one of the 26 fascinating constellations – from the well-known Zodiac signs to charming animal constellations. The process of assembling the viewer itself is part of the fun, a two-in-one creative experience that leads to a spectacular payoff. But the magic doesn't stop there! Included is a handy booklet that not only guides you through placing the constellations in the starry sky but also sparks a passion for stargazing and the breathtaking beauty of the night. This kit is an incredible way to introduce children to astronomy in a playful and engaging manner. You'll find a viewer to assemble, a wooden ring for a sturdy build, four sheets of vibrant stickers to add flair, and 26 constellation punch cards neatly organized in their own storage case. For precise punching, a dedicated hole punch and a punch board are provided. And of course, the essential constellation booklet and a clear set of step-by-step instructions to ensure a smooth and enjoyable crafting journey. What’s especially wonderful is that this entire kit is crafted from FSC certified paper and cardboard, so you can feel good about the materials used. Watch your child's eyes light up as they discover constellations and create their own personal planetarium. It's a gift of imagination and discovery that keeps on giving, sparking joy and wonder with every punched star and every peek through the viewer.

products.title: Grecian Computer Puzzle: Uncover Ancient Mysteries with this Fun & Engaging Wooden Logic Brain Teaser for Ages 12+
products.description: Grecian Computer Puzzle Antikythera Inspired Challenge of Ancient Astronomical Prediction Embark on a thrilling intellectual adventure with the Grecian Computer Puzzle, a game that will transport you back to the summer of 1901, when a remarkable contraption was discovered in a shipwreck near the beautiful Greek island of Antikythera. This ancient marvel is widely recognized as the world's first known analog computer, a testament to the incredible ingenuity of ancient Greek astronomers. This captivating puzzle, inspired by their genius, invites you to become a modern-day scholar, tasked with an engaging challenge: meticulously turn the intricate dials of this unique mechanism until all twelve columns magically add up to the number 42. It's more than just a puzzle; it's an interactive journey through history, a hands-on experience with a fascinating piece of scientific heritage. Designed for adventurers aged 12 and up, this game promises hours of fun and a rewarding sense of accomplishment as you unlock the secrets of this ancient calculating device. The quality construction ensures durability, making it a cherished item for aspiring historians and puzzle enthusiasts alike. Perfect for family game nights, this puzzle fosters critical thinking and problem-solving skills while providing an entertaining and educational experience for everyone. Imagine the excitement of cracking the code of a device that once charted the stars and predicted celestial events. This puzzle brings that sense of discovery right into your home, offering a unique blend of historical intrigue and engaging gameplay. It's a wonderful way to spark curiosity about science, history, and mathematics in a way that feels like an epic quest.

products.title: Go Genius English
products.description:
Children will take the educational trip of a lifetime with this great fun board game. 
 It supports Key Stage 1 and 2 teaching and is designed to help and improve children's knowledge of the English language. 
 
 As well as being entertaining and educational, Go Genius English is responsibly made with sustainable and recyclable materials. 
 
 The aim of the game is get as many points as possible.

 Players travel round the board answering questions on everything from spelling, punctuation and grammar to poetry and prose.

 They need to try and avoid the spaces that tell them to miss a go, move backwards or do a forfeit!

 Players who gain more than 15 points can put a genius stamp (provided) into their Go Genius passport (provided for children to personalise). Not everyone is a genius but the idea is the more you play the game, the more you learn. Players can also refresh their grasp of the subject by downloading a Go Genius Learning Aid online. Once players have won the points required to earn a genius stamp for Go Genius English, they can then move on to another Go Genius title and fill up their passport with genius stamps!

 Age 7+ to adult

products.title: My First Coding and Robotics: Build & Code Fun Robots, Easy Card Programming for Kids Ages 4-8, No Computer Needed STEM Learning Toy
products.description: My First Coding and Robotics Kit: A Fun Journey into Programming and Engineering! Get ready for an exciting adventure into the world of coding and robotics with the My First Coding and Robotics Kit! This fantastic set is designed to introduce young minds, ages 4 to 8, to the fundamentals of programming in a super engaging and hands-on way. Forget about needing screens or complex devices; this kit uses clever physical code cards that your adorable robot pal, Sammy, reads with its special optical identifier sensor on its underside. Simply lay out a sequence of these code cards, and watch as Sammy understands its mission! Once programmed, place Sammy on a grid made of map cards, and get ready to see your creations come to life! Sammy can be programmed to zoom in different directions, activate its integrated output gear for fun moving parts like arms, flash its colorful LED lights, and even play cheerful sounds. The possibilities are endless as your child learns to think like a programmer and an engineer. The built-in output gear is a game-changer, allowing kids to build simple robotic creations that respond to their coded commands, fostering creativity and a sense of accomplishment. This kit is more than just play; it's a brilliant introduction to physical engineering and essential problem-solving skills through a series of progressively challenging building and coding lessons. These 30 illustrated lessons are expertly crafted and aligned with important computer science education standards from organizations like CSTA and ISTE, and even courses from Code.org, ensuring a valuable learning experience. The full-color illustrated manual, which can be accessed online for convenience, provides step-by-step guidance for both coding lessons and model assembly, making it perfect for adult-child collaboration or independent exploration for older kids. The lessons cleverly cover six key coding areas: sequencing, loops, events, conditionals, functions, and variables, all presented in a way that feels like fun and discovery. Sammy isn't the only star; the kit includes five other engaging stories with related model-building and coding challenges. Imagine a mouse navigating a maze to find cheese, a penguin exploring a zoo, a soccer player scoring a goal, a fire truck bravely putting out a blaze, or a factory robot efficiently completing its tasks. Each scenario provides a unique context for applying learned coding concepts. To power Sammy's adventures, you'll need 3 AA batteries, which are conveniently supplied separately. This kit truly makes learning about technology an enjoyable and accessible experience for the whole family.
